fullplot: It is the 13th century, and Russia is overrun by foreign invaders. A Russian knyaz', or prince, Alexander Nevsky, rallies the people to form a ragtag army to drive back an invasion by the Teutonic knights. This is a true story based on the actual battle at a lake near Novgorod.
plot: The story of how a great Russian prince led a ragtag army to battle an invading force of Teutonic Knights.
title: Alexander Nevsky
